description: This course develops and stimulates research into the emotional/expressive properties of painting. By investigating thematic, compositional, and technical problems, students develop a personalized approach to ideas and content. Students learn the importance of process, flexibility, alternatives, and the recognition that a painting has a life of its own. Materials fee. Offered annually. Prerequisite: ART 102.
name: Oil/Acrylic Painting
notes: The materials fee for ARTS 221 will be $200.
Not open to incoming first-year students.
